experience.title: Associate Software Engineer
experience.info: Contributing to an application supporting 16 banks across Egypt.​
eesponsibilities: Identify, analyze, and resolve software issues in production
Address security vulnerabilities using tools like DexGuard.
Develop and implement new features to meet business requirements.
Ensure application reliability and scalability using Java and Kotlin.

experience.title: Native Android Developer
eesponsibilities: Troubleshoot, debug and upgrade existing software.
Adding new features to existing software.
Produce clean, efficient code based on specifications.
Collaborating with other developers and stakeholders to ensure the app meets business requirements.
